author: Special Correspondent
text:
Pattali Makkal Katchi (PMK) leader and MP Anbumani Ramadoss will conduct a public consultation in 22 Assembly constituencies within Chennai Corporation limits.

According to a press release, the party has already released the draft of ‘Naam Virumbum Chennai’ on January 9, focussing on policies to prevent disasters and improve civic conditions in the city. The consultation will elicit views of the public on civic aspects covered in the draft.

Dr. Ramadoss will participate in the public consultations at Thousand Lights, Egmore, Harbour, Royapuram, R.K. Nagar, Tiruvottiyur, Madhavaram and Perambur Assembly constituencies on January 22.

Consultations will be held in Anna Nagar, Villivakkam, Thiru.Vi.Ka. Nagar, Kolathur, Ambathur, Maduravoyal, Virugambakkam, and Thyagaraya Nagar on January 23. Constituencies such as Chepauk-Thiruvallikeni, Mylapore, Saidapet, Velachery, Sholinganallur and Alandur will be covered on January 24. Dr. Anbumani will conclude his programme at a meeting to be organised near Ranga Theatre in Alandur, the release said.
title: PMK to hold public consultations
